actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to promote rail-highway safety by requiring light-reflecting markings on railroad locomotives and cars.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish orders requiring light-reflecting markings on railroad locomotives and cars.

titles.title: A bill to promote rail-highway safety by requiring light-reflecting markings on railroad locomotives and cars.
